name: Salt Branding
description:
We work at the intersection of brand and digital, helping ambitious leaders define and express what makes their business truly essential. We create and evolve brands, products and services by developing the core elements of brand strategy, architecture, naming, messaging, visual identity and communications. By distilling what’s essential, we’re far more adept at the digital translation – web, mobile, user experience and content development.
This fusion of brand and digital brings an exponential effect: highly compelling stories, genuine engagement, motivated advocates and tangible business results.
